Topic Summary: Appeal as to whether the credit for income tax paid by the Appellant's parents which is treated as CGT pursuant to section 730K(5) of the TCA1997, is available to offset against the Appellant's CAT liability.
Tax Legislation: Section 2 of the Capital Acquisitions Tax Consolidation Act 2003 ("CATCA2003"); Section 4 of the CATCA2003; Section 5 of the CATCA2003; Section 104 of the CATCA2003; Section 535 of the Taxes Consolidation Act 1997 ("TCA1997"); Section 730K(1) of the TCA 1997;
